message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if you were to acquire this item. My initial offer for the product is $900000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns regarding the budget. In light of this, I am willing to consider a compromise. My counteroffer for the product is $875000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $860000.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Bob. Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to offer the product at $870000. This is my final offer in this negotiation.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've considered your proposal carefully, and I would like to counter with an offer of $865000.
After careful consideration of your latest offer, I am willing to accept $867500 for the product. This is my final offer in this negotiation.
